amendment.description: An amendment numbered 94 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds from being used to implement any of the administration's executive orders on climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.
